dct_title_s: Situation des principales ressources minerales de l'Afrique Location of chief mineral resources of Africa
dct_description_sm: "Fonds topographiques l'Equisse structurale provisoire de l'Afrique (document ASGA)". © Unesco 1962. Original map is filed in the Map/Geospatial Center, a map reproduction is attached to companion volume. Companion text devotes the first chapter to a history of "Topographic mapping of Africa". Document established with the assistance of the Association of African Geological Surveys. 1961.
dct_publisher_sm: Paris : United Nations Educational, Scientific, and Cultural Organisations 1961.
